title: Bionic Commando Rearmed (1C)+Patch+NoCD
description:
Capcom's original Bionic Commando remains one of gaming's genuine classics. A kinetic ballet of gunning, running and gymnastic supremacy, thanks to the titular hero's Bionic Arm - all seemingly lost in the digital mists of time. So when it was announced that the franchise was to return to gaming in the shape of a brand new all-singing, all-dancing instalment on PC, the hearts of a whole generation of gamers were stirred. 

This version (English, Russian...(Multi-8)) from 1C whis official patch 1.01 and 100% working NoDVD from Tlinks.
